name: Artisan 6 Page
summary: Learn about .A6PAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Artisan allows you to customize pages with photos, text, shapes, and other elements for various memory-related designs, such as scrapbooks, photo books, and calendars. You can then export them to be preserved digitally or printed.
The A6PAGE format is a Zip archive that stores various files, including:
ArchiveInfo.txt - .TXT file that stores information about the archive.
MainDocument.xml - .XML file that stores information about the contents of the page.
Thumbnail.jpg - JPG thumbnail of the page.
NOTE: Artisan was formerly known as Storybook Creator and developed by Creative Memories. FOREVER then acquired Storybook Creator and re-branded it as Artisan.

description: An A6PAGE file is a memory design page created by version 6 of FOREVER Artisan, an app for preserving memories in scrapbooks, calendars, etc. It is a Zip archive containing multiple files that store information about the design elements of the page, including text, images, shapes, and its metadata. FOREVER introduced A6PAGE files when it released version 6 of Artisan, replacing .ARTPAGE files used by version 5 of Artisan.

instructions: You can open A6PAGE files with FOREVER Artisan (version 6 or later) in Windows. For example, you can open an A6PAGE file by selecting File â†’ Open.

You can also decompress A6PAGE files and extract their contents with a Zip-compression utility. To do this, rename the .a6page file extension as .zip, then extract its contents with a utility, such as Microsoft File Explorer in Windows and Apple Archive Utility in macOS.
FOREVER Artisan can convert A6PAGE files to various formats, including the following file types:
